Package com.game.Characters

Class ZombieProfessor

java.lang.Object
com.game.Utilities.Position
com.game.Characters.Character
com.game.Characters.Enemy
com.game.Characters.ZombieProfessor
public class ZombieProfessor extends Enemy
Represents a "ZombieProfessor" enemy type within the game.

This class extends the Enemy class to introduce a unique enemy with specific characteristics and behavior, represented by a zombie version of a professor. It customizes the enemy appearance by loading specific images for the zombie professor and can include additional behaviors or interactions unique to this enemy type.

  • Constructor Details

    • ZombieProfessor

      public ZombieProfessor(int speed, MainGamePanel gamePanel)
      Constructs a ZombieProfessor with specified speed and associates it with a game panel.

      Initializes the enemy with the given movement speed and sets up its position within the game world using the GamePanel parameter. This constructor calls the superclass constructor to establish common enemy attributes and then proceeds to load the specific images for the ZombieProfessor.

      Parameters:
      speed - the movement speed of the ZombieProfessor
      gamePanel - the game panel the enemy belongs to

  • Method Details

    • getImage

      public void getImage()
      Loads the image resources specifically for the ZombieProfessor.

      Overrides the getImage method in the superclass to load unique images that depict the zombie professor from the left and right perspectives, giving it a distinct appearance.

      Overrides:
      getImage in class Enemy
